name: polyglot-tech-blog
description: 11ty starter template with i18n, syntax highlight, light and dark themes, SASS support and Dark Mode.
author: Florent Tassy

scripts.set:dev:baseUrl: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const host = require('./prod.js'); const data = 'src/_data/data.json'; let content = fs.readFileSync(data, 'utf8'); fs.writeFileSync(data, content.replace(host.baseUrl, 'http://localhost:8080'));"
scripts.set:dev:pathPrefix: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const host = require('./prod.js'); const config = './.eleventy.js'; let content = fs.readFileSync(config, 'utf8'); fs.writeFileSync(config, content.replace('pathPrefix: \"'+host.pathPrefix+'\"', 'pathPrefix: \"\"'));"
scripts.set:prod:baseUrl: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const host = require('./prod.js'); const data = 'src/_data/data.json'; let content = fs.readFileSync(data, 'utf8'); fs.writeFileSync(data, content.replace('http://localhost:8080', host.baseUrl));"
scripts.set:prod:pathPrefix: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const host = require('./prod.js'); const config = './.eleventy.js'; let content = fs.readFileSync(config, 'utf8'); fs.writeFileSync(config, content.replace('pathPrefix: \"\"', 'pathPrefix: \"'+host.pathPrefix+'\"'));"
scripts.prenetlify:build: cp -f netlify.js prod.js && npm run clean && npm run set:prod:baseUrl && npm run set:prod:pathPrefix
scripts.postnetlify:build: npm run set:dev:baseUrl && npm run set:dev:pathPrefix && rm -f prod.js
scripts.premanual:build: npm run clean && npm run set:prod:baseUrl && npm run set:prod:pathPrefix
scripts.postmanual:build: npm run set:dev:baseUrl && npm run set:dev:pathPrefix
scripts.check:dependencies: npx auditjs ossi && npm outdated && npm audit
scripts.clean: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); fs.rm('public',{recursive: true}, () => fs.mkdir('public', () => console.log('"public" cleaned...')))"
